replies.msg: 狗會係咪世界盃贏太多

Liverpool boss Klopp is targeting Premier League title glory this season, keen for his side to keep improving after they reached the Champions League final last term.

The Reds moved quickly to secure an agreement for Naby Keita in January, with Fabinho, Xherdan Shaqiri and Alisson Becker since arriving.

Liverpool have splashed an unusual amount on new recruits over the last few months, with Virgil van Dijk and Alisson costing a huge £141million combined.

And ESPN have now delved into how the Reds were able to loosen the purse-strings for Klopp this summer.

It is claimed that the bulk of the deals were possible because of Philippe Coutinho.
